sentences.en: " Thank you,'she said sweetly, deliberately misunderstanding his jibe.
sentences.cn: " 谢谢你, " 她温柔地说, 故意装做不懂他的意思.

sentences.en: "No doubt he'll give me the chance to fight him again," he jibed.
sentences.cn: “毫无疑问，他会给我机会与他再打一次。”他嘲讽道。

sentences.en: Her story didn't jibe with the witnesses'account.
sentences.cn: 她的说法和证人的描述有出入.

sentences.en: His position did not jibe with his ideal.
sentences.cn: 他的地位不合乎他的理想.

sentences.en: His position jibe with his ideal.
sentences.cn: 他的地位不合他的理想.

sentences.en: How did your expectations jibe with the reality?
sentences.cn: 你的期望和现实有多大差距？

sentences.en: Nicely spoken. I can appreciate a well - placed jibe. Perhaps I will speak with you, after all.
sentences.cn: 说得好, 我能接受适当地嘲讽, 也许, 不管怎样,我还会和你交谈.

sentences.en: The bank is clearly fed up with the constant jibe that it has no clear management strategy.
sentences.cn: 银行显然已经听厌了那些嘲讽其缺乏明确管理策略的风凉话。

sentences.en: The report does not jibe with the facts.
They did not jibe so well.
This, apparently , doesn't jibe with Cristina's understanding of the document.
sentences.cn: 这显然与 克里斯提娜 对文件的了解不符.

sentences.en: What he says does not jibe with what others say.
sentences.cn: 他所说的与其他人说的不一致.

sentences.en: When used as a noun, jibe refers to a remark that attacks someone.
sentences.cn: 当这个字当名词使用时, 意指攻击某人的言论.

trans.tran_en: if two statements, reports etc jibe with each other, the information in them matches

trans.tran_cn: 与…一致，（与…）相符，嘲弄，（帆）从一舷转至他舷，使调换方向，使改变航道
